If I have time maybe over the next few days I'll really dig into the details and make this a proper concept instead of a speedpainting and hammer out some cool design features to make her read well individually instead of just as a one off concept.)

https://33.media.tumblr.com/1168ebe563f1800fd660bf3016d94df2/tumblr_nba15xWL311qk32lpo2_r1_1280.png
Hey guys! So lately I've been trying to pump out a Character speedpaint a day. Today I made a quick concept inspired by Liandry's Torment! It was originally going to be a black and white study but a bit of color worked its way in there. I've got this idea in my head that she's the fallen Queen of what would become the Shadow Isles. This was just a painting exercise, I have no idea as to how she'd function as a champion.

Made this in a few hours today in Adobe Photoshop CS6.  It's a little rough but I'm mostly trying to improve my speed, so I was a little sloppy putting it together. Just figured I'd throw it up here since it's relatively League related!! <3

Progress shots and other stuff can be found at my personal blog [here](http://www.faeriefountain.tumblr.com), my art blog [here](http://www.tomrandbyart.tumblr.com), or my website [here](http://www.thomasrandby.com)! Thanks for taking a look C:

Given your projected lore adn the item it's based off of, Q should be a high AP ability and the rest of her abilities should be like a last-stand-I'm-bringing-you-down-with-me kind of theme. Maybe a passive damage done to enemies that hit Liandry based on AP, and maybe an E that drains HP. It would probably be easy to drown her in a vampire schema, but I could see this champion taking off, despite the similarity to Lissandra {{champion:127}}.

I see her as a painbringer-type rather than a vampire. Someone who just directly feeds pain to your synapses. Also, someone who has suffered a lot.

Passive: Torment - Liandry's spells apply a stacking slow that refreshes upon each application. 10% per stack. Unlimited stacks. 1.5 second duration.

Q: Agony's Embrace - Liandry creates a space of ethereal energy at a targeted location. After 1 second the energy attacks all targets in it's reach, directly attacking their nervous system dealing 90/130/170/210/250 (+35% AP) and increasing their damage taken by 3/6/9/12/15% for 3 seconds.

Passive component: Liandry gains 6/9/12/15/18 Health and 4/6/8/10/12 mana when she kills a unit with this ability. Doubles for Champions.
50 mana, 6 second cooldown, 550 range, 150 radius.

W: Share the Pain - Liandry creates a tether between herself and an enemy for 4 seconds. After 0.5 seconds the first damage is applied. Over the entire duration of the tether 15/20/25/30/35% of damage Liandry takes (pre-mitigation) is dealt to the tethered person. Initial damage is 80 / 110 / 140 / 170 / 200 (+ 25% AP). Returned damage is dealt as magic damage.
65 mana, 12 second cooldown. 650 range, leash is 750.

E: Cripple - Liandry saps the strength to fight from her opponent. She removes 5/7/10/13/15% AP and AD from her enemy (4 seconds) and deals damage over time increased by her passive stack (If passive stack is 10%, it deals 10% more).
Damage per half second = 20/30/45/60/75 (+12% AP) Maximum damage = 160/240/360/480/600 (+96% AP).
75/80/85/90/95 mana, 18/17/16/15/14 cooldown, 650 range.

R: Sadism - Liandry creates a 1500 range aura centered on herself and moving with her, inside this aura Liandry gains 20% health of the damage (after mitigation) dealt to allies (but not herself) and enemies for the duration. The ultimate will apply 1 stack of the passive and keep it refreshed.
100 mana, 160/150/140 second cooldown.

Nearby units gain -1.11/2.22/3.33/4.44/5.55/6.66/7.77/8.88/9.99/11.10/12.21/13.32/14.43/15.54/16.65/17.76/18.87/19.98 Magic Resist. ***Q*** - Accursed Pillar - Summons a pillar. Enemies near the pillar are dealt 9 / 18 / 27 / 36 / 45 (+9% AP) each second with increasing slow from 15 ~ 35% each second and growing from a radius of 150 ~ 225. The pillar lasts for 4 seconds and blocks movement within 31.5 range. If enemies affected doesn't move under 1 second, fear them for 0.5 second. Enemy champions caught in the center of eruption are briefly knocked back and gain Tormented - DoT Magic damage that deals 1% / 2% / 3% / 4% / 5% (+%AP) of target's current health. Liandry gains a stack of Accursed Pillar every 23 / 21 / 18 / 14 / 9 seconds for a maximum of 3 stacks. She can cast a pillar once every 0.5 seconds
***W*** - Hollow Shackles - Summons three leashes that seeks the three nearest enemy units for 3 seconds (prioritizes Champions). If it touches a champion, stun them for 1 ~ 2.5 seconds based on how far the leash traveled and deal 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 (+90%AP), if not, just root them and deal the supposed magic damage. Champions whose level is lower than Liandry, if being chased by one of her leashes while their backs are facing Liandry, and when the leash already reached halfway on touching the target enemy champion, target unit gain Panicked - This unit moves more quickly in exchange for reduced armor and magic resist. If the target is isolated, damage dealt to this unit is amplified for 3 seconds
***E*** - Shadowstep - Active: Teleports to a target location. Enemies within 150 range upon arrival are feared for 0.75 seconds. Passive: As long as Liandry stays out of sight from enemies, her next basic attack will deal bonus magic damage and have a chance of inflicting Fear for (min. 0.25sec max. 1sec) depending on how long she stayed hidden. If Liandry stayed hidden for 9 seconds or more, her next basic attack will apply Tormented. If Liandry attacked after 9 seconds, and when the back of the target attacked is facing Liandry, target gain Suffering - This unit is enduring endless pain. Enemy units affected have their magic resist and armor reduced.
***R*** - Wail of Sorrow - After channeling for 1.5 seconds, sends out a sonic wave that damages enemies in AoE Range for 125/ 250 / 375 ~ 375 / 500 / 625 (+AP) depending on how near they are to Liandry. All units affected are silenced for 1~2.5 seconds and their attack speeds slowed by 15%~35% depending on how near they are to Liandry.

I think of this champion as one that should be inspired by the effects of the item and items you would tend to build with it. Very heavy us of DOT based abilities. A passive that increases damage to opponents under CC effects. very strong late game damage, with some powerful early tools, but give her a weak midgame (kind of like how haunting guise provides great early game stats whereas liandry's torment is only really effective in the late game). People who build liandries tend to also build a lot of  health items, so I would have her as one of the higher health AP mages. would love to do a champion concept if you wouldnt mind :D
